profile.name: Scott Grocott
profile.purpose: Private AI-driven personal operations system for managing home life, projects, goals, and resources. This file may contain sensitive personal information and will not be public.

experience.title: Principal Engineer / Indie Developer
experience.summary: Independent software studio focused on Local-First AI agents and WebGL game development.

projects.name: BuggyWhip (AI Agent SaaS)
responsibilities: Developing a Local-First AI Agent system using Node.js and Ollama for privacy-focused LLM interactions.
Architected a JSON-based logic layer for dynamic prompt augmentation and context injection.
Implemented an LLM-agnostic abstraction layer to switch between models (Llama 3, Mistral) seamlessly.
Built a RESTful API for agent communication and state management.

projects.name: Metal Throne (Web-First FPS)
responsibilities: Developing a browser-based Dystopian FPS using WebGL standards (Three.js/A-Frame).
Integrated LLM APIs in custom Web IDE/Level Editor for dynamic in-game debugging and development support agents.
Created 3D assets and environments using Blender.
Managed full-stack game architecture from concept to deployment.

projects.name: Mountain City - Web Video Series (@164cray network)
responsibilities: Conceptualized flagship web video series for 164cray network.
Design and engineering of 1:64 scale miniature sets.
Conceptualized/Engineered realtime animation system for 1:64 scale vehicles.
Shooting, editing, and audio engineering.

experience.title: Technical Producer / Creative Technologist
responsibilities: Designed and engineered a magnetic mechanical animation system for 1:64 scale motion control.
Full-cycle video production and editing using DaVinci Resolve.
Sound design and audio engineering using Reason DAW.
Episodic content writing, set fabrication, and digital asset management.

experience.title: Synthesizer/Guitarist & Technical Lead
responsibilities: Developed a browser-based preset and setlist management system using Node.js and JavaScript.
Programmed custom MIDI logic applications for hardware integration.
Live stage performance and Roland GR-55 Guitar Synthesizer operation.

experience.title: Operations & Logistics
responsibilities: Maintained logistics and warehouse operations while pursuing independent software projects.
Customer service and inventory management.

experience.title: Senior Web Systems Engineer & Consultant
experience.summary: Provided full-stack engineering, database architecture, and e-commerce solutions for a diverse portfolio of clients.
